title: Education Entity Type Vocabulary
description: Domain-specific refinement of CEP entity types for education institutions, programs, participants, and related entities.

terms.label: Education Institution
terms.definition: An organization that delivers education services, such as a school, district, college, or university.

terms.label: Education Program
terms.definition: A coherent set of courses or learning activities leading to a credential, degree, certificate, or other recognized outcome.

terms.label: Course Instance
terms.definition: A specific scheduled offering of a course or class, tied to a term, instructor, and roster of participants.

terms.label: Education Person
terms.definition: A natural person who participates in education as a student, instructor, administrator, or other role within the education system.

terms.label: Credential
terms.definition: A formal record of completion or attainment, such as a degree, diploma, certificate, or license linked to programs or courses.

terms.label: Assessment or Evaluation
terms.definition: An assessment instrument, exam, or evaluation event associated with student learning or program outcomes.

terms.label: Education Governance Body
terms.definition: A board, council, committee, or similar collective entity that provides governance, oversight, or policy direction for education institutions or systems.

terms.label: Other Education Entity
terms.definition: An education-related entity that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but participates in CEP education graphs.
